name: Social Media, App and Web Design
description:
This is a collection of 4 online courses and a practical exercise, taking approx 20 hours in total. Content covered includes learning how to effectively use social media for business, why user experience is important, about mobile design and development, how to use the Wix website builder and the basics of HTML5 to start building and editing web pages.

To prove completion of the online courses, the student must provide a copy of the course completion certificates provided by the course provider. We also have access to the Course Provider system and can verifiy % complete and level of interaction with the course if there is any doubt about the level of engagement. Students must also submit a first draft of a personal portfolio website, which should include a personal bio and CV. This is checked by the TechUP team for compliance.
Students are required to submit links to their Twitter and LinkedIn profiles, these are checked by the TechUP team for compliance.

alignment.targetDescription: Institute of Coding recognition of self assessed knowledge

criteria.narrative: Participants must complete all 4 online courses, update and submit their social media profiles for review and create a personal portfolio website to be awarded the digital badge.
